snippet.title: Million Monster Militia - A Solo Roguelike Deckbuilding Auto Battler!
snippet.description: 'Murica is Under Attack! - This time, 50 giant bosses have taken over 50 cities in the United States (including recently-annexed Montreal). It's your job to cross the country, gathering troops to free the terrified population.
